mapper.insert: insert into app_teacher( member_id, degree, school, major, wage) values(#{no},#{degree},#{school},#{major},#{wage})
mapper.select: select m.member_id, m.name, m.tel, t.degree, t.major, t.wage from app_teacher t inner join app_member m on t.member_id = m.member_id order by m.name asc
select m.member_id, m.name, m.email, m.tel, m.created_date, t.degree, t.school, t.major, t.wage from app_teacher t inner join app_member m on t.member_id = m.member_id where m.member_id=#{no}

select m.member_id, m.name, m.email, m.tel, m.created_date, t.degree, t.school, t.major, t.wage from app_teacher t inner join app_member m on t.member_id = m.member_id where m.email = #{email} and m.pwd = sha2(#{password},256)
